resources.string: The file was generated to the root of the phone. Use any file manager and search for \\\"/0\\\" or \\\"sdcard\\\". Another option is go to default phone Contacts App and search for \"import\".

When you click COPY, go to a file manager, create any file - it can be a text file (.txt) or Word (.docx) or any other file and rename the ending to \".vcf\" (hint: contacts.vcf \"). After that, just click on import.
